cards.name: Etrata, the Silencer
cards.text:
Etrata, the Silencer can't be blocked.
Whenever Etrata deals combat damage to a player, exile target creature that player controls and put a hit counter on that card. That player loses the game if they own three or more exiled cards with hit counters on them. Etrata's owner shuffles Etrata into their library.

cards.name: Stolen Identity
cards.text:
Create a token that's a copy of target artifact or creature.
Cipher (Then you may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of the encoded card without paying its mana cost.)

cards.name: Syncopate
cards.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.
cards.flavor: "Patience, mage. Killing you now would be too easy."

cards.name: Telling Time
cards.text: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of those cards into your hand, one on top of your library, and one on the bottom of your library.
cards.flavor: Mastery is achieved when "telling time" becomes "telling time what to do."

cards.name: Last Gasp
cards.text: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: "Allow me a moment to catch your breath."

cards.name: Netherborn Phalanx
cards.text:
When Netherborn Phalanx enters the battlefield, each opponent loses 1 life for each creature they control.
Transmute {1}{B}{B} ({1}{B}{B}, Discard this card: Search your library for a card with the same mana value as this card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then then shuffle. Transmute only as a sorcery.)

cards.name: Ribbons of Night
cards.text: Ribbons of Night deals 4 damage to target creature and you gain 4 life. If {U} was spent to cast this spell, draw a card.
cards.flavor:
"My favorite meal is angel's flesh, slain in agony and iced with black vinegar."
-Aszala of House Dimir

cards.name: Call of the Nightwing
cards.text:
Create a 1/1 blue and black Horror creature token with flying.
Cipher (Then you may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of the encoded card without paying its mana cost.)

cards.name: Circu, Dimir Lobotomist
cards.text:
Whenever you cast a blue spell, exile the top card of target player's library.
Whenever you cast a black spell, exile the top card of target player's library.
Your opponents can't cast spells with the same name as a card exiled with Circu, Dimir Lobotomist.

foreignPrintings.name: ディミーアの脳外科医、シアクー

cards.name: Consuming Aberration
cards.text:
Consuming Aberration's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your opponents' graveyards.
Whenever you cast a spell, each opponent reveals cards from the top of their library until they reveal a land card, then puts those cards into their graveyard.

cards.name: Dimir Charm
cards.text:
Choose one -
• Counter target sorcery spell.
• Destroy target creature with power 2 or less.
• Look at the top three cards of target player's library. Put one back and the rest into that player's graveyard.
cards.flavor:
"Dangerous to recognize. Deadly not to."
-Lazav

cards.name: Dimir Doppelganger
cards.text: {1}{U}{B}: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. Dimir Doppelganger becomes a copy of that card, except it has this ability.
cards.flavor: "Fear not. Your life will not go unlived."

foreignPrintings.name: ディミーアのドッペルゲンガー

cards.name: Dimir Guildmage
cards.text:
({U/B} can be paid with either {U} or {B}.)
{3}{U}: Target player draws a card. Activate only as a sorcery.
{3}{B}: Target player discards a card. Activate only as a sorcery.

foreignPrintings.name: ディミーアのギルド魔道士

cards.name: Dinrova Horror
cards.text: When Dinrova Horror enters the battlefield, return target permanent to its owner's hand, then that player discards a card.
cards.flavor:
"Welcome to the Dimir Public Offices. Not responsible for death or loss of property. Basement off-limits."
-Sign outside Dinrova Building

foreignPrintings.name: ディンローヴァの恐怖

cards.name: Glimpse the Unthinkable
cards.text: Target player mills ten cards.
cards.flavor:
"I am confident that if anyone actually penetrates our facades, even the most perceptive would still be fundamentally unprepared for the truth of House Dimir."
-Szadek

cards.name: Lazav, Dimir Mastermind
cards.text:
Hexproof
Whenever a creature card is put into an opponent's graveyard from anywhere, you may have Lazav, Dimir Mastermind become a copy of that card, except its name is Lazav, Dimir Mastermind, it's legendary in addition to its other types, and it has hexproof and this ability.

foreignPrintings.name: ディミーアの黒幕ラザーヴ

cards.name: Mirko Vosk, Mind Drinker
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Mirko Vosk, Mind Drinker deals combat damage to a player, that player reveals cards from the top of their library until they reveal four land cards, then puts those cards into their graveyard.

foreignPrintings.name: 精神を飲む者、ミルコ・ヴォスク

cards.name: Moroii
cards.text:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life.
cards.flavor:
"Touched by moroii"
-Undercity slang meaning "to grow old"

cards.name: Nightveil Specter
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Nightveil Specter deals combat damage to a player, that player exiles the top card of their library.
You may play lands and cast spells from among cards exiled with Nightveil Specter.

cards.name: Szadek, Lord of Secrets
cards.text:
Flying
If Szadek, Lord of Secrets would deal combat damage to a player, instead put that many +1/+1 counters on Szadek and that player mills that many cards.

cards.name: Warped Physique
cards.text: Target creature gets +X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of cards in your hand.
cards.flavor: The Gruul seek unbounded strength. The Dimir deliver cruel irony.

cards.name: Dimir Signet
cards.flavor: An emblem of a secret guild, the Dimir insignia is seen only by its own members-and the doomed.

cards.name: Dimir Aqueduct
cards.text:
Dimir Aqueduct enters the battlefield tapped.
When Dimir Aqueduct enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand.
{T}: Add {U}{B}.

cards.name: Niv-Mizzet, the Firemind
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever you draw a card, Niv-Mizzet, the Firemind deals 1 damage to any target.
{T}: Draw a card.

cards.name: Thunderheads
cards.text:
Replicate {2}{U} (When you cast this spell, copy it for each time you paid its replicate cost.)
Create a 3/3 blue Weird creature token with defender and flying. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.
cards.flavor: The clouds grew thick, and then they grew teeth.

cards.name: Char
cards.text: Char deals 4 damage to any target and 2 damage to you.
cards.flavor: Izzet mages often acquire their magic reagents from dubious sources, so the potency of their spells is never predictable.

cards.name: Electrickery
cards.text:
Electrickery deals 1 damage to target creature you don't control.
Overload {1}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")

cards.name: Goblin Rally
cards.text: Create four 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.
cards.flavor: You don't so much hire goblins as put ideas in their heads.

cards.name: Guttersnipe
cards.text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Guttersnipe deals 2 damage to each opponent.
cards.flavor: He wants to watch Ravnica burn, one soul at a time.

cards.name: Mizzium Mortars
cards.text:
Mizzium Mortars deals 4 damage to target creature you don't control.
Overload {3}{R}{R}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")

cards.name: Pyromatics
cards.text:
Replicate {1}{R} (When you cast this spell, copy it for each time you paid its replicate cost. You may choose new targets for the copies.)
Pyromatics deals 1 damage to any target.

cards.name: Shattering Spree
cards.text:
Replicate {R} (When you cast this spell, copy it for each time you paid its replicate cost. You may choose new targets for the copies.)
Destroy target artifact.

cards.name: Cerebral Vortex
cards.text: Target player draws two cards, then Cerebral Vortex deals damage to that player equal to the number of cards they've drawn this turn.
cards.flavor: Izzet brains and Izzet boilers: contents under pressure.

cards.name: Djinn Illuminatus
cards.text:
({U/R} can be paid with either {U} or {R}.)
Flying
Each instant and sorcery spell you cast has replicate. The replicate cost is equal to its mana cost. (When you cast it, copy it for each time you paid its replicate cost. You may choose new targets for the copies.)

cards.name: Electrolyze
cards.text:
Electrolyze deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two targets.
Draw a card.
cards.flavor: The Izzet learn something from every lesson they teach.

cards.name: Gelectrode
cards.text:
{T}: Gelectrode deals 1 damage to any target.
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may untap Gelectrode.
cards.flavor:
"Diametrically opposing energies in self-sealed plasmodermic bubbles make great pets!"
-Trivaz, Izzet mage

cards.name: Hypersonic Dragon
cards.text:
Flying, haste
You may cast sorcery spells as though they had flash. (You may cast them any time you could cast an instant.)
cards.flavor:
"Even this primitive specimen of my kind is impressive."
-Niv-Mizzet

cards.name: Invoke the Firemind
cards.text:
Choose one -
• Draw X cards.
• Invoke the Firemind deals X damage to any target.
cards.flavor: To those in tune with the Firemind, there is no difference between knowledge and flame.

cards.name: Izzet Charm
cards.text:
Choose one -
• Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {2}.
• Izzet Charm deals 2 damage to target creature.
• Draw two cards, then discard two cards.

cards.name: Nivix Guildmage
cards.text:
{1}{U}{R}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
{2}{U}{R}: Copy target instant or sorcery spell you control. You may choose new targets for the copy.
cards.flavor: "The only action worth taking is one with an unknown outcome."

foreignPrintings.name: ニヴィックスのギルド魔道士

cards.name: Stitch in Time
cards.text: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, take an extra turn after this one.
cards.flavor: Quyzl was told by his mentor to "make more time" for his studies.

cards.name: Tibor and Lumia
cards.text:
Whenever you cast a blue spell, target creature gains flying until end of turn.
Whenever you cast a red spell, Tibor and Lumia deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.
cards.flavor: Tracing the horizon in a dance of wind and fire.

cards.name: Turn
cards.text:
Until end of turn, target creature loses all abilities and becomes a red Weird with base power and toughness 0/1.
Fuse (You may cast one or both halves of this card from your hand.)

cards.name: Burn
cards.text:
Burn deals 2 damage to any target.
Fuse (You may cast one or both halves of this card from your hand.)

cards.name: Izzet Signet
cards.flavor: The Izzet signet is redesigned often, each time becoming closer to a vanity portrait of Niv-Mizzet.

cards.name: Izzet Boilerworks
cards.text:
Izzet Boilerworks enters the battlefield tapped.
When Izzet Boilerworks enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand.
{T}: Add {U}{R}.

cards.name: Izoni, Thousand-Eyed
cards.text:
Undergrowth - When Izoni, Thousand-Eyed enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 black and green Insect creature token for each creature card in your graveyard.
{B}{G}, Sacrifice another creature: You gain 1 life and draw a card.

foreignPrintings.name: Izoni, la del Millar de Ojos

cards.name: Darkblast
cards.text:
Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
Dredge 3 (If you would draw a card, you may mill three cards instead. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand.)

cards.name: Slum Reaper
cards.text: When Slum Reaper enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices a creature.
cards.flavor: The outskirts of Golgari territory are guarded by more than just walls.

foreignPrintings.name: 貧民街の刈り取るもの

cards.name: Stinkweed Imp
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Stinkweed Imp deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature.
Dredge 5 (If you would draw a card, you may mill five cards instead. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand.)

cards.name: Vigor Mortis
cards.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. If {G} was spent to cast this spell, that creature enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.
cards.flavor: After fear and weakness rot away, that which remains is stronger than its living form.

cards.name: Deadbridge Goliath
cards.text: Scavenge {4}{G}{G} ({4}{G}{G}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to this card's power on target creature. Scavenge only as a sorcery.)
cards.flavor: Some Golgari insects live for centuries-and they never stop growing.

cards.name: Elves of Deep Shadow
cards.text: {T}: Add {B}. Elves of Deep Shadow deals 1 damage to you.
cards.flavor: Cast out of the Conclave generations ago, these elves found a home in the corrupted districts of the Golgari.

cards.name: Abrupt Decay
cards.text:
This spell can't be countered.
Destroy target nonland permanent with mana value 3 or less.
cards.flavor: The Izzet quickly suspended their policy of lifetime guarantees.

cards.name: Deadbridge Chant
cards.text:
When Deadbridge Chant enters the battlefield, mill ten cards.
At the beginning of your upkeep, choose a card at random in your graveyard. If it's a creature card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put it into your hand.

cards.name: Deathrite Shaman
cards.text:
{T}: Exile target land card from a graveyard. Add one mana of any color.
{B}, {T}: Exile target instant or sorcery card from a graveyard. Each opponent loses 2 life.
{G}, {T}: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. You gain 2 life.

cards.name: Drown in Filth
cards.text: Choose target creature. Mill four cards, then that creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn for each land card in your graveyard.
cards.flavor: The rot farmer's first rite of passage is to craft a pair of work stilts.

cards.name: Gaze of Granite
cards.text: Destroy each nonland permanent with mana value X or less.
cards.flavor: Golgari reclaimers resent the gorgons, begrudging the loss of so many fine nutrients locked away in stone.

cards.name: Golgari Charm
cards.text:
Choose one -
• All creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.
• Destroy target enchantment.
• Regenerate each creature you control.
cards.flavor:
"Let the rest of Ravnica sneer. One way or another, they all end up in the undercity."
-Jarad

cards.name: Grave-Shell Scarab
cards.text:
{1}, Sacrifice Grave-Shell Scarab: Draw a card.
Dredge 1 (If you would draw a card, you may mill a card instead. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand.)

cards.name: Grisly Salvage
cards.text: Reveal the top five cards of your library. You may put a creature or land card from among them into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.
cards.flavor: To the Golgari, anything buried is treasure.

cards.name: Jarad, Golgari Lich Lord
cards.text:
Jarad, Golgari Lich Lord gets +1/+1 for each creature card in your graveyard.
{1}{B}{G}, Sacrifice another creature: Each opponent loses life equal to the sacrificed creature's power.
Sacrifice a Swamp and a Forest: Return Jarad from your graveyard to your hand.

foreignPrintings.name: ゴルガリの死者の王、ジャラド

cards.name: Korozda Guildmage
cards.text:
{1}{B}{G}: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains intimidate until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)
{2}{B}{G}, Sacrifice a nontoken creature: Create X 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens, where X is the sacrificed creature's toughness.

foreignPrintings.name: コロズダのギルド魔道士

cards.name: Lotleth Troll
cards.text:
Trample
Discard a creature card: Put a +1/+1 counter on Lotleth Troll.
{B}: Regenerate Lotleth Troll.
cards.flavor: He lurks in the undercity, eager for the corpse haulers to unload their rotting cargo.

cards.name: Putrefy
cards.text: Destroy target artifact or creature. It can't be regenerated.
cards.flavor:
"All matter, animate or not, rots when exposed to time. We merely speed up the process."
-Ezoc, Golgari rot farmer

cards.name: Savra, Queen of the Golgari
cards.text:
Whenever you sacrifice a black creature, you may pay 2 life. If you do, each other player sacrifices a creature.
Whenever you sacrifice a green creature, you may gain 2 life.
cards.flavor: "Nature's most raw beauty is the circle: perfect in its continuance, with no break between death and life."

foreignPrintings.name: ゴルガリの女王、サヴラ

cards.name: Shambling Shell
cards.text:
Sacrifice Shambling Shell: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
Dredge 3 (If you would draw a card, you may mill three cards instead. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand.)

cards.name: Sisters of Stone Death
cards.text:
{G}: Target creature blocks Sisters of Stone Death this turn if able.
{B}{G}: Exile target creature blocking or blocked by Sisters of Stone Death.
{2}{B}: Put a creature card exiled with Sisters of Stone Death onto the battlefield under your control.

foreignPrintings.name: Sœurs de la mort de pierre

cards.name: Treasured Find
cards.text: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand. Exile Treasured Find.
cards.flavor: Gorgons crave beautiful things: gems, exquisite amulets, the alabaster corpses of the petrified dead . . .

cards.name: Golgari Signet
cards.flavor: Depending on your point of view, the seal represents a proud guardian of the natural cycle or one who has sold her soul to darkness for eternal life.

cards.name: Golgari Rot Farm
cards.text:
Golgari Rot Farm enters the battlefield tapped.
When Golgari Rot Farm enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand.
{T}: Add {B}{G}.

cards.name: Aurelia, the Warleader
cards.text:
Flying, vigilance, haste
Whenever Aurelia, the Warleader attacks for the first time each turn, untap all creatures you control. After this phase, there is an additional combat phase.
cards.flavor: Where Razia was aloof and untouchable, Aurelia is on the frontlines, calling for war.

cards.name: Boros Elite
cards.text: Battalion - Whenever Boros Elite and at least two other creatures attack, Boros Elite gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"First, you must fight among the rank and file. It is there I will discern your skills as a leader."
-Aurelia, to Gideon Jura

cards.name: Daring Skyjek
cards.text: Battalion - Whenever Daring Skyjek and at least two other creatures attack, Daring Skyjek gains flying until end of turn.
cards.flavor: "The hard part isn't landing in the saddle. The hard part is leaping before you see it."

cards.name: Bomber Corps
cards.text: Battalion - Whenever Bomber Corps and at least two other creatures attack, Bomber Corps deals 1 damage to any target.
cards.flavor: "Subtlety is for lawmages and spies."

cards.name: Frenzied Goblin
cards.text: Whenever Frenzied Goblin attacks, you may pay {R}. If you do, target creature can't block this turn.
cards.flavor: The upside to not thinking about the consequences is that you'll always surprise those who do.

cards.name: Legion Loyalist
cards.text:
Haste
Battalion - Whenever Legion Loyalist and at least two other creatures attack, creatures you control gain first strike and trample until end of turn and can't be blocked by creature tokens this turn.

cards.name: Agrus Kos, Wojek Veteran
cards.text: Whenever Agrus Kos, Wojek Veteran attacks, attacking red creatures get +2/+0 and attacking white creatures get +0/+2 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Lieutenant Kos has never met a group of recruits he could not inspire or a mob he could not quell.

foreignPrintings.name: ウォジェクの古参兵、アグルス・コス

cards.name: Boros Charm
cards.text:
Choose one -
• Boros Charm deals 4 damage to target player or planeswalker.
• Permanents you control gain indestructible until end of turn.
• Target creature gains double strike until end of turn.

cards.name: Boros Reckoner
cards.text:
Whenever Boros Reckoner is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to any target.
{R/W}: Boros Reckoner gains first strike until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"Imagine a thunderstorm that's also a tactical genius. That's him."
-Dars Gostok, Firefist captain

cards.name: Boros Swiftblade
cards.text: Double strike
cards.flavor: When the Boros Legion attacks, swiftblades enter the fray first. They pick off the archers and mages, softening the enemy front before the flame-kin and giants go in.

cards.name: Brightflame
cards.text: Radiance - Brightflame deals X damage to target creature and each other creature that shares a color with it. You gain life equal to the damage dealt this way.
cards.flavor:
"Let the pyres of the unbelievers light our way."
-Razia

cards.name: Firemane Angel
cards.text:
Flying, first strike
At the beginning of your upkeep, if Firemane Angel is in your graveyard or on the battlefield, you may gain 1 life.
{6}{R}{R}{W}{W}: Return Firemane Angel from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate only during your upkeep.

cards.name: Firemane Avenger
cards.text:
Flying
Battalion - Whenever Firemane Avenger and at least two other creatures attack, Firemane Avenger deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life.
cards.flavor: Firemane Nevena led the victorious assault on the Barbu Rooftop rebels. Now the Gateless have marked her for death.

cards.name: Lightning Helix
cards.text: Lightning Helix deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life.
cards.flavor: Though less well-known than its army of soldiers, the Boros Legion's mage-priests are as respected by the innocent as they are hated by the ghosts of the guilty.

cards.name: Martial Glory
cards.text:
Target creature gets +3/+0 until end of turn.
Target creature gets +0/+3 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"Yes, Boros tactics are unparalleled. But when your comrades are dying around you, inner strength must carry the day."
-Gideon Jura, to Aurelia

cards.name: Master Warcraft
cards.text:
Cast this spell only before attackers are declared.
You choose which creatures attack this turn.
You choose which creatures block this turn and how those creatures block.

foreignPrintings.name: Maîtrise de l'art de la guerre

cards.name: Razia, Boros Archangel
cards.text:
Flying, vigilance, haste
{T}: The next 3 damage that would be dealt to target creature you control this turn is dealt to another target creature instead.
cards.flavor: Her sword burns with such brightness that foes avert their eyes and arrows divert their paths.

foreignPrintings.name: ボロスの大天使、ラジア

cards.name: Spark Trooper
cards.text:
Trample, lifelink, haste
At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Spark Trooper.
cards.flavor: Izzet-designed conductors atop Sunhome charge empty sets of armor that give form to the fluctuating elementals.

cards.name: Sunhome Guildmage
cards.text:
{1}{R}{W}: Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
{2}{R}{W}: Create a 1/1 red and white Soldier creature token with haste.

foreignPrintings.name: Mago del gremio de Casa Solar
サンホームのギルド魔道士

cards.name: Boros Keyrune
cards.text:
{T}: Add {R} or {W}.
{R}{W}: Boros Keyrune becomes a 1/1 red and white Soldier artifact creature with double strike until end of turn. (It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)

cards.name: Boros Signet
cards.flavor:
"Have you ever held a Boros signet? There's a weight to it that belies its size-a weight of strength and of pride."
-Agrus Kos

cards.name: Boros Garrison
cards.text:
Boros Garrison enters the battlefield tapped.
When Boros Garrison enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand.
{T}: Add {R}{W}.

cards.name: Sunhome, Fortress of the Legion
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{2}{R}{W}, {T}: Target creature gains double strike until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Sunhome-the stalwart shield, the towering sentinel, the seat of justice.

foreignPrintings.name: Casa Solar, base de la Legión

cards.name: Trostani, Selesnya's Voice
cards.text:
Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, you gain life equal to that creature's toughness.
{1}{G}{W}, {T}: Populate. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)
cards.flavor: There are no soloists in the chorus of Selesnya.

foreignPrintings.name: セレズニアの声、トロスターニ

cards.name: Devouring Light
cards.text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Exile target attacking or blocking creature.
cards.flavor: Into the light the good are welcomed, and with the light the evil are banished.

cards.name: Hour of Reckoning
cards.text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Destroy all nontoken creatures.
cards.flavor:
"Ravnica, like a hedge, must be pruned, leaving only leaves of verdant uniformity."
-Niszka, Selesnya evangel

cards.name: Gather Courage
cards.text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

cards.name: Scatter the Seeds
cards.text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Create three 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens.
cards.flavor: From the seeds of faith, great forests grow.

cards.name: Advent of the Wurm
cards.text: Create a 5/5 green Wurm creature token with trample.
cards.flavor: The consciousness of Mat'Selesnya does not always spread in peaceful ways.

cards.name: Armada Wurm
cards.text:
Trample
When Armada Wurm enters the battlefield, create a 5/5 green Wurm creature token with trample.
cards.flavor: No one in the Conclave acts alone.

cards.name: Call of the Conclave
cards.text: Create a 3/3 green Centaur creature token.
cards.flavor: Centaurs are sent to evangelize in Gruul territories where words of war speak louder than prayers of peace.

cards.name: Centaur Healer
cards.text: When Centaur Healer enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
cards.flavor: Instructors at the Kasarna training grounds are capable healers in case their students fail to grasp the subtleties of combat.

foreignPrintings.name: ケンタウルスの癒し手

cards.name: Dryad Militant
cards.text: If an instant or sorcery card would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.
cards.flavor: "We will defend the Worldsoul from Izzet 'progress' at any cost."

cards.name: Glare of Subdual
cards.text: Tap an untapped creature you control: Tap target artifact or creature.
cards.flavor: The righteous light of Selesnya is channeled through the devout, striking out to blind the nonbelievers.

cards.name: Growing Ranks
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, populate. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)
cards.flavor:
"We will grow an army large enough to withstand the Izzet's madness."
-Trostani

cards.name: Loxodon Hierarch
cards.text:
When Loxodon Hierarch enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.
{G}{W}, Sacrifice Loxodon Hierarch: Regenerate each creature you control.
cards.flavor: "I have lived long, and I remember how this city once was. If my death serves to bring back the Ravnica in my memory, then so be it."

cards.name: Pollenbright Wings
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has flying.
Whenever enchanted creature deals combat damage to a player, create that many 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens.

cards.name: Privileged Position
cards.text:
({G/W} can be paid with either {G} or {W}.)
Other permanents you control have hexproof. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
cards.flavor:
"We in the Conclave have a saying: 'When you hold a shield, lend your shield.' The strong must never forget what they owe to the weak."
- Niszka, Selesnya evangel

cards.name: Selesnya Charm
cards.text:
Choose one -
• Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn.
• Exile target creature with power 5 or greater.
• Create a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance.

cards.name: Selesnya Evangel
cards.text: {1}, {T}, Tap an untapped creature you control: Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.
cards.flavor: "The clamor of the city drowns all voices. But together we can sing a harmony that will resonate from Ravnica's tallest spires to her deepest wells."

cards.name: Selesnya Guildmage
cards.text:
{3}{G}: Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.
{3}{W}: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

foreignPrintings.name: セレズニアのギルド魔道士

cards.name: Sundering Growth
cards.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment, then populate. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)
cards.flavor:
"One day every pillar will be a tree and every hall a glade."
-Trostani

cards.name: Tolsimir Wolfblood
cards.text:
Other green creatures you control get +1/+1.
Other white creatures you control get +1/+1.
{T}: Create Voja, a legendary 2/2 green and white Wolf creature token.

foreignPrintings.name: トルシミール・ウルフブラッド

cards.name: Watchwolf
cards.flavor: Only in Ravnica do the wolves watch the flock.

cards.name: Selesnya Signet
cards.flavor: The symbol of the Conclave is one of unity, with tree supporting sun and sun feeding tree.

cards.name: Grove of the Guardian
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{3}{G}{W}, {T}, Tap two untapped creatures you control, Sacrifice Grove of the Guardian: Create an 8/8 green and white Elemental creature token with vigilance.

cards.name: Selesnya Sanctuary
cards.text:
Selesnya Sanctuary enters the battlefield tapped.
When Selesnya Sanctuary enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand.
{T}: Add {G}{W}.
